### ==The Power of ‚ÄòYes, And‚Äô==

==Stop picking sides. Start picking what works. That‚Äôs open education.==

## ==üìä TREND==

### ==Breaking Down Education Walls==

==OpenEd has long championed flexible education, with students mixing home-based learning, community classes, and public school courses. Now, with==¬†[==Utah‚Äôs new education funding program==](https://yeseverykidfoundation.org/why-public-schools-should-love-esas/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=095-the-power-of-yes-and)==, more public schools are embracing this approach.==

==Case in point: Canyons School District just announced they‚Äôre opening their doors wider for part-time students. Want to take just engineering? Done. Need access to the robotics lab? No problem. Looking for marching band or sports? Come on in.==

==It‚Äôs part of a larger shift away from ‚Äúeither-or‚Äù thinking in education. A recent survey found 80% of families want customizable education, but only 38% feel they can currently achieve it.==

==The future of education looks more like a buffet than a set menu.==

[==Read the full article at Yes. Every Kid. Foundation.==](https://yeseverykidfoundation.org/why-public-schools-should-love-esas/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=095-the-power-of-yes-and)

## ==‚öíÔ∏è TOOL==

### ==Growing Readers Naturally==

==The conventional approach says: First, learn to read, then read to learn.==

==The alternative path says: Fall in love with stories first. The skills will follow.==

[==Read-Aloud Revival==](https://readaloudrevival.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=095-the-power-of-yes-and)¬†==is changing how families approach reading education.==

- ==A podcast with practical tips and author interviews==
- ==Basic book discussion guides==

==RAR Premium adds:==

- ==Monthly family book clubs with complete lesson guides==
- ==Live author events and workshops==

- ==Parent coaching and support==

==**Two quick fixes from yesterday‚Äôs newsletter:**==

2. ==Utah families: The link to express interest in Falcon AeroLab‚Äôs summer aerospace camp was temporarily disabled. You can express your interest==¬†[==here==](https://forms.gle/BMKoQhE83RwitPVm8?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=095-the-power-of-yes-and)==.
